msContents.summary: Collection of drawings of Hans Verhagen der Stomme

support.watermark: watermarks in the paper of Verhagen’s drawings indicate a date between 1547 and 1568.

history.acquisition: The group of drawings was detached from a manuscript of which nothing is known.
